seo.title: 10x Wins Public Sector Innovation Award | 10x.GSA.gov
seo.description: Read about how 10x, an innovative program in funding and developing technology solutions that serve the public, was recognized with a 2019 Public Sector Innovation award.

title: Announcing the Public Sector Innovation winners
excerpt: Read about how 10x, an innovative program in funding and developing technology solutions that serve the public, was recognized with a 2019 Public Sector Innovation award.

sections.body: In 2019, 10x was recognized with a Government Innovation Award. 10x, part of the General Services Administration (GSA) was recognized at the Government Innovation Awards dinner (and 10x’s [Will Cahoe was recognized as a 2019 Rising Star](https://fcw.com/articles/2019/08/26/rising-stars-2019.aspx)). Read more about [10x’s Government Innovation Award](https://gcn.com/articles/2019/08/26/government-innovation-awards-2019.aspx).
